Plot: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.
Title: The Love Punch
Writer: Joel Hopkins, Tess Morris (additional writing by)
Actors: Emma Thompson, Pierce Brosnan, Celia Imrie, Timothy Spall
tomatoConsensus: In spite of a pair of extremely talented leads and a premise that should lend itself to entertaining action and comedy, The Love Punch manages to waste it all on a bungled attempt at classic caper cinema.
